snippet: Steve Johnson of the United States beat fourth-seeded Richard Gasquet 7-6 (2), 6-2 on a rain-hit opening day of the Wimbledon warmup tournament at Queen's Club on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Steve Johnson of the United States beat fourth-seeded Richard Gasquet 7-6 (2), 6-2 on a rain-hit opening day of the Wimbledon warmup tournament at Queen's Club on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Johnson Beats 4th-Seeded Gasquet at Queen's Club
headline.main: Johnson Beats 4th-Seeded Gasquet at Queen's Club
